member.name: M:ActorsGallery.Controllers.CharactersController.Post(ActorsGallery.Core.DTOs.CharacterDTO)
member.summary: Create a new character with the properties and values supplied in characterObj.
member.param: A JSON object containing FirstName, LastName, Status, StateOfOrigin, Gender and LocationId properties.
member.returns: A JSON object whose Payload property contains the newly created Character object, with missing properties included.
member.response: Bad request! Check for any error, and try again.

member.name: M:ActorsGallery.Controllers.CharactersController.Put(System.String,ActorsGallery.Core.DTOs.CharacterDTO)
member.summary: Update an existing character with the properties and values supplied in characterObj.
member.param: The id of the character to be updated.
A JSON object containing FirstName, LastName, Status, StateOfOrigin, Gender and LocationId properties.
member.returns: A JSON object whose Payload property contains the updated Character object, with missing properties included.
member.response: Bad request! Check for any error, and try again.

member.name: M:ActorsGallery.Controllers.CharactersController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a character with the specified id
member.param: The id of the character to be deleted.
member.returns: A JSON object whose Payload property has no value.
member.response: Bad request! Check for any error, and try again.
